Verses: 1 karththaave, En Muzhu Irudhayaththodum Ummaith Thudhippen; Ummudaiya Adhisayangalaiyellaam Vivarippen.
2 ummil Magizhndhu Kalikooruven; Unnadhamaanavare, Umadhu Naamaththaik Keerththanampannuven.
3 en Saththurukkal Pinnaagath Thirumbumbodhu, Umadhu Samugaththil Avargal Idarundu Azhindhupovaargal.
4 neer En Niyaayaththaiyum En Vazhakkaiyum Theerththu, Needhiyulla Niyaayaadhibadhiyaai Singaasanaththinmel Veetrirukkireer.
5 jaadhigalaik Kadindhukondu, Thunmaarkkarai Azhiththu, Avargal Naamaththai Endrendraikkum Illaadhapadi Kulaiththuppotteer.
6 saththurukkal Endrendraikkum Paazhaakkappattaargal; Avargal Pattanangalai Nirmoolamaakkineer; Avargal Perum Avargalodekooda Ozhindhupoyitru.
7 karththaro Endrendraikkum Iruppaar; Thammudaiya Singaasanaththai Niyaayaththeerppukku Aayaththampanninaar.
8 avar Poochchakkaraththai Needhiyaai Niyaayantheerththu, Sagala Janangalukkum Semmaiyaai Needhiseyvaar.
9 sirumaippattavanukkuk Karththar Adaikkalamaanavar; Nerukkappadugira Kaalangalil Avare Thanjamaanavar.
10 karththaave, Ummaith Thedugiravargalai Neer Kaividugiradhillai; Aadhalaal, Umadhu Naamaththai Arindhavargal Ummai Nambiyiruppaargal.
11 seeyonil Vaasamaayirukkira Karththaraik Keerththanampanni, Avar Seygaigalai Janangalukkulle Ariviyungal.
12 raththappazhigalaikkuriththu Avar Visaaranai Seyyumpodhu, Avaigalai Ninaikkiraar; Sirumaippattavargaludaiya Kooppidudhalai Maravaar.
13 maranavaasalgalilirundhu Ennaith Thookkividugira Karththaave, Naan Ummudaiya Thudhigalaiyellaam Seeyon Kumaaraththiyin Vaasalgalil Vivariththu, Ummudaiya Ratchippinaal Kalikoorumpadikku,
14 dhevareer Enakku Irangi, Ennaip Pagaikkiravargalaal Enakku Varum Thunbaththai Nokkippaarum.
15 jaadhigal Thaangal Vettina Kuzhiyil Thaangale Vizhundhaargal; Avargal Maraivaai Vaiththa Valaiyil Avargaludaiya Kaale Agappattukkondadhu.
16 karththar Thaam Seydha Niyaayaththinaal Ariyappadugiraar; Dhunmaarkkan Than Kaigalin Seygaiyile Sikkikkondaan.(ikaayon,selaa.)
17 dhunmaarkkarum, Dhevanai Marakkira Ellaa Jaadhigalum, Naragaththile Thallappaduvaargal.
18 eliyavan Endraikkum Marakkappaduvadhillai; Sirumaippattavargaludaiya Nambikkai Orupodhum Kettuppovadhillai.
19 ezhundharulum Karththaave, Manushan Belan Kollaadhapadi Seyyum; Jaadhigal Ummudaiya Samugaththil Niyaayantheerkkappadakkadavargal.
20 jaadhigal Thangalai Manusharendru Ariyumpadikku, Avargalukkup Bayamundaakkum, Karththaave. (selaa.)
